content: **details** * pattern consists of 22 rounds * use any brand size-10 thread --------------------------------------------- **languages** *pattern is available in english russian and persian * * russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri * persian/فارسی language translation provided by maryam amiri 1 ---------------------------------------------------- this pattern was designed in honor of elise jurgensen after reading her mother s memoir *the disappearance a primer of loss* ------------------------------------- **community** join our discussion and support group for emilyandthe designs on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 1 https //www instagram com/simabaft/
